column2: "Mekamfo hɛn akyerɛbaa Foebe a ɔyɛ Kenkreaen asɔr mu ɔsomfo no kyerɛ hom
column4: "dɛ hom ngye no Ewuradze mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata ahotseweefo
column5: na hom mboa no wɔ biribiara a obehia efi hom hɔ no mu: na nankasa so ayɛ ɔboafo ama nyimpa pii

column2: "Hom nkyia Priska nye Akwila
column3: m’anyɛnkofo edwumayɛfo wɔ Kraest Jesus mu a"

column2: "mo nkwa ntsi wɔdze hɔnankasa hɔn nkwa kitsaa hɔn nsamu no: na nnyɛ mo nko na meda hɔn ase
column3: na mbom asɔr a wɔwɔ amanaman do nyina so;"

column2: "na hom nkyia asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔn fie no so. Hom nkyia mo dɔfo Epaenetus a ɔyɛ nyia a ofi Asia a odzii kan yɛɛ Kraest dze no."
"Hom nkyia Mary a ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen pii maa hom no."
"Hom nkyia Andronikus nye Junias
column3: m’ebusuafo nye m’anyɛnkofo a menye hɔn ada efiadze a wɔwɔ dzin wɔ asomafo no mu
column4: na eso wodzii m’enyim kan wɔ Kraest mu no."

column2: "Hom nkyia Ewuradze mu mo dɔfo Ampliatus mma me."
"Hom nkyia Urbanus
column3: hɛn nyɛnko dwumayɛnyi wɔ Kraest mu

column2: "Hom nkyia Apeles a wɔasɔ no ahwɛ wɔ Kraest mu no. Hom nkyia hɔn a wofi Aristobulus fidua mu no."
"Hom nkyia mo busuanyi Herodion. Hom nkyia hɔn a wofi Narsisus fidua mu a wɔwɔ Ewuradze mu no."
"Hom nkyia Trifaena nye Trifosa a wɔbɔ Ewuradze mu mbɔdzen no. Hom nkyia ɔdɔfo Persis a ɔbɔɔ Ewuradze mu mbɔdzen pii no."
"Hom nkyia Rufus a wɔasan mu eyi no Ewuradze mu no
column3: ɔnye ɔno na emi hɛn na no."

column2: "Hom nkyia Asinkritus
column7: nye enuanom a wɔka hɔn ho no."

column2: "Hom nkyia Filologus nye Julia
column5: nye ahotseweefo a wɔka hɔn ho no nyina."

column2: "Hom mfa mfewano krɔnkrɔn nkyiakyia homho nkorkor. Kraest asɔrasɔr nyina kyiakyia hom."
"Na afei
column5: hɔn a wɔdze mpaapaamu ba na wɔto fintsidua a otsia nkyerɛkyerɛ a hom esua no
column7: na hom ntwe homho mfi hɔn ho."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtse dɛm no wɔnnsom hɛn Ewuradze Kraest
column3: na mbom hɔnankasa hɔn yafun a
column4: na wɔdze tɛkyerɛmadɛw nye adɔkɔdɔkɔsɛm daadaa hɔn a wonnyim hwee no."

column2: "Na hom dze
column3: hom setsie atahye edu nyimpa nyina asomu. Iyi ntsi midzi hom ho dɛw
column4: naaso mepɛ dɛ hom yɛ enyansafo wɔ papa ho
column5: na hom twe hom ho koraa fi bɔn ho."

column2: "Na asomdwee Nyankopɔn bodwuruw Satan wɔ hom ananadze ntsɛmara. Hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nka hom."
"Me nyɛnko dwumayɛnyi Timoti kyia hom; nye m’ebusuafo Lusius nye Jason nye Sosipater."
"Emi Tertius a mekyerɛw nwoma yi
"Gaius a ɔsom me nye asɔrmba nyina hɔho no kyia hom. Erastus a ɔyɛ kurow yi mu sikakorafo no ɔnye no nua Kwartus kyia hom."
"[Hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nye hom nyina ntsena. Amen.]"
"Na afei
column3: nyia otum dɛ ɔhyɛ hom dzen
column4: dɛ mbrɛ m’asɛmpa nye Jesus Kraest ho asɛnka tse
column5: dɛ mbrɛ esumasɛm nyikyerɛ a wofi tsetse esie no foo no
column8: na ɔnam nkɔnhyɛfo kyerɛwnsɛm no do
column9: dɛ mbrɛ onnyiewiei Nyankopɔn ne mbrasɛm tse no
column10: woyi kyerɛ amanaman nyina kɔ gyedzi setsie mu
column12: "Nyankopɔn a ɔno nkotsee nye nyansafo no
column13: ɔno na enyimnyam ndua Jesus Kraest do nka no afebɔɔ. Amen."
